column4: Hi, I'm trying to run "Commandos: behind enemy lines" in WINE in ubuntu - but it seems to run too fast. Is there any way I can slow it down?
you might have already checked this.. some games have speed controls within it's settings.. you might as well try that if Commandos have that
- first thing I checked, no such luck =(
there is a program called cpukiller, you might try using it with wine
